# Simulieren der Daten

```{r}
set.seed(12345)

# Mu,ber of variables: 
p <- 3  
# 3000 observations:
n <- 3000

# draw expected values from uniform distribution
mu <- c(5,10,20)


# Covariance Matrix

v <- matrix(0.5, p, p)   # correlation of 0.5 betweenn all variables

diag(v) <- 1 # eventuell mit inverse wishart draw ersetzen aber bisher noch nict angeschaut wie des geht


v

x_df_org <- mvrnorm(n, mu, v) %>% data.frame()
names(x_df_org) <- paste0("x_", 1:3)
head(x_df_org)
```


```{r}
output <- lm(x_1 ~ x_2 + x_3, data = x_df_org)

summary(output)
```
